t:
As our planet started to die because of the nuclear war and the nuclear winter that followed, we sent two of us to a planet closer to our sun â€” to repopulate.



We hope, you can keep our population thriving, Adam and Eve.
c:
The Gods did wrong.



#planet #nuclear #war #winter #population #end #genesis #recreate





Technically, only two person can not keep our population going. There would be too much inbreeding. Search for 'Minimum viable population', '50/500 rule', etc.
